channel.title: Idea: Collaboration
channel.description:
I was thinking of making a tribute to dream theater, and thought, why not make a collaborative effort of covering [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vNWErnAydLM]A Change of Seasons[/url]? Its a 23 minute masterpiece, with drums/bass/keys/guitar/vocals. We could have people playing a few minutes each (preferably on cam) and then I could mix it all together. Vocals of course would be a challenge but I'm sure someone would notice it and offer to guest vocals if it was on youtube long enough.
I know there are a lot of musicians on the forums so I'm sure we could get enough people, ideally 5 or so per instrument. Interested? post!!
tabs for the super interested: http://www.ultimate-guitar.com/tabs/d/dream_theater/a_change_of_seasons_guitar_pro.htm

id love to do something, keys is probably the better bet given that im shitty at guitar

item.title: Idea: Collaboration
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

Unhandled:

Get me a 6 string bass and I’ll do it.

yeah this might be a problem, everything rhythm is on 7 string guitar too

i was also considering octavarium but no one has a continuum??

Read full topic
